block.p: SCHINDLER-Helen. Born in Poland, October 31, 1904. Died peacefully June 12, 2000 at age 95 in Hollywood, FL. Former resident of Kew Gardens. Beloved wife of the late Henry. Devoted mother of Joe P. Schindler. Mother-in-law of Jane Schindler. Cherished grandmother of Deborah, Rachel and Aaron Schindler, and Todd Thaler. Adored great grandmother of Emma Thaler. Private graveside service Thursday, June 15th, New Montefiore Cemetery, Pinelawn, L.I. Contributions in Helen's memory may be made to the Multiple Myeloma Research Foundation, N.Y. Presbyterian Hospital/ Cornell, attn Dr. Joseph Michaeli, 525 E. 68 St, NY NY 10021.
